ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.algorithm

Interface IAlgorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAlgorithm, BreadthFirstSearch, DFSRecursive, DijkstraDistance, KruskalMSF

    public interface IAlgorithm
    An algorithm able to operate on a graph.
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch)
